name: TheFireKeeper
description:
The Fire Keeper is a game made by Zeta and RadioBear.

We spent 25Hours in total creating this game for our very first Game Jam, LD46.

Zeta specializes in Coding.

RadioBear specializes in Visual.

We have a lot more to learn and this is just another step.

How to Play :

Pay attention to your Hunger and campfire Fuel.

Grab Mushrooms to replenish your hunger.

Pick up Tree Branches and deliver it to your campfire to extend its life.

The Hungrier you get, the Slower you move and the Less items u can hold.

Keep your Stomache full and keep the Fire alive until the next morning and you Win!
